09/26/2023,748.2151(c)(2) - Medication,Medication,No,09/29/2023,09/29/2023,L:Medication,Medium,Yes,"Three of the medication's logs reviewed has a different prescribing doctor than, the doctor found on the medication pill back does. ","
column2: Houstons House of Hopes Licensed Child Care Administrator and Program Director will ensure that the prescribing physicians name is corrected on each medication form for each child.

Houstons House of Hopes Licensed Child Care Administrator and Program Director will also notate on the medication form the new prescribing physicians name if the child is prescribed a refill for the same medication.

column1: Houstons House of Hopes Licensed Child Care Administrator and Program Director

column2: will complete weekly audits to ensure that the medication forms having the correct information and the correct prescribers name.
